note:
Physicist in training, polymath, nature enthusiast, science fiction and fantasy enjoyer. EMU.
"Our society, in which reigns an eager desire for riches and luxury, does not understand the value of science. It does not realize that science is a most precious part of its moral patrimony. Nor does it take sufficient cognizance of the fact that science is at the base of all the progress that lightens the burden of life and lessens its suffering." — Marie Skłodowska–Curie
